spell_tooltip.description:
Siphon haste from enemies, stealing 2% haste per stack of Mind Trauma, stacking up to 9 times. Mind Spike and fully channeled Mind Flays grant 1 stack of Mind Trauma and fully channeled Void Torrents grant 3 stacks of Mind Trauma. Lasts 15 sec.

You can only gain 3 stacks of Mind Trauma from a single enemy.
15% of all damage you take is stored. The stored amount cannot exceed 12% of your maximum health. The initial damage of your next Shadow Word: Pain deals this stored damage to your target.

Step into the shadows when you cast Fade, avoiding all attacks and spells for 1 sec.

Interrupt effects are not affected by Phase Shift.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 138,780 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 59,273 Holy damage to enemies and up to 34,405 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.

If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.  If a target dies within 7 sec after being struck by your Shadow Word: Death, you gain 8 Insanity.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy for 12 sec, causing you to heal a nearby ally for 50% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 2 Insanity.

Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 176,776 and dealing 293,110 Shadow damage to enemies. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 46 yards is healed for 40,200.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 197,452.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 65,817.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 319,953 Shadow damage plus an additional 352,436 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 25% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 48,639 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 4 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.
Healing from Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. The shield cannot exceed 10% of your maximum health.
Vampiric Touch also applies Shadow Word: Pain to the target. Shadow Word: Pain lasts an additional 5 sec.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Your direct damage spells inflict 35% of their damage on all other targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch within 46 yards.

Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

 Mind Flay: Insanity
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 1.2 million Shadow damage over 1.3 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Generates 12 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 890,565 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Aim a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at the destination, dealing 98,812 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at a selected location.

Releases an explosive blast of pure void energy, activating Voidform and causing 223,289 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yds of your target.

During Voidform, this ability is replaced by Void Bolt.

Casting Devouring Plague increases the duration of Voidform by 2.5 sec.

Increases the damage of Mind Flay and Mind Spike by 10%.

The duration of your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch is increased by 1 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Flay and 2 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Spike.
Shadow Crash applies Vampiric Touch to up to 8 targets it damages.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.
Voidform and Dark Ascension increase the critical strike chance of your spells by 10% for 20 sec, reducing by 0.5% every sec.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.
Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Mind Blast has a 5% chance to make your next Devouring Plague cost no Insanity and deal 20% additional damage.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Devouring Plague by 5.
Your Shadowy Apparitions deal 15% increased damage and have a chance to generate 1 Insanity.

Channel a torrent of void energy into the target, dealing 1.4 million Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 80% faster on all targets for 3 sec.

Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a 6% chance to create Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch. 

Critical strikes increase the chance to 12%.
Reduces the cooldown of Void Torrent by 15 sec.

Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a 30% chance to apply Echoing Void, max 4 targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 17,239 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.

After conjuring Shadowy Apparitions, gain a stack of Idol of Yogg-Saron. At 25 stacks, you summon a Thing from Beyond that casts Void Spike at nearby enemies for 20 sec.

 Void Spike
Hurls a bolt of dark magic, dealing 137,096 Shadow damage and 28,772 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent have a chance to spawn a Void Tendril that channels Mind Flay or Void Lasher that channels Mind Sear at your target.

 Mind Flay
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 456,872 Shadow damage over 15 sec and slowing their movement speed by 30%.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Sear
Corrosive shadow energy radiates from the target, dealing 254,403 Shadow damage over 15 sec to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.

Casting Halo also causes you to create a Halo around you at 100% effectiveness every 5 sec for 10 sec.

Additionally, the radius of Halo is increased by 10 yards.
Your damage dealt is increased by 12% while Dark Ascension is active and by 20% while Voidform is active.
Enemies damaged by your Halo take 2% increased damage from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Insanity.
Psychic Scream creates an image of you at your location. After 4 sec, the image will let out a Psychic Scream.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.

Increases the damage done by Mind Flay: Insanity and Mind Spike: Insanity by 60%.

Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.

Creating a Halo extends the duration of Voidform by 1 sec. If Voidform is not active, up to 6 seconds is stored.

While out of combat or affected by a loss of control effect, the duration of Voidform is paused for up to 20 sec.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Consuming Surge of Insanity has a 100% chance to conjure Shadowy Apparitions.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 134,590 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.

If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.  If a target dies within 7 sec after being struck by your Shadow Word: Death, you gain 8 Insanity.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Summons shadowy tendrils, rooting all enemies within 8 yards for 15 sec or until the tendril is killed.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy for 12 sec, causing you to heal a nearby ally for 50% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Reduces the mana cost of Purify Disease and Mass Dispel by 50% and Dispel Magic by 10%.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 2 Insanity.

Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 175,810 and dealing 295,823 Shadow damage to enemies. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 46 yards is healed for 38,947.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 319,953 Shadow damage plus an additional 352,436 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 25% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 48,737 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 4 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.
Healing from Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. The shield cannot exceed 10% of your maximum health.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

 Mind Flay: Insanity
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 1.2 million Shadow damage over 1.3 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Generates 12 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 887,298 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Hurl a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at your target, dealing 98,801 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at your target.

Increases your non-periodic Shadow damage by 20% for 20 sec.

Generates 30 Insanity.

Blasts the target for 212,173 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 4 Insanity.
Shadow Crash applies Vampiric Touch to up to 8 targets it damages.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.
Voidform and Dark Ascension increase the critical strike chance of your spells by 10% for 20 sec, reducing by 0.5% every sec.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.
Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Devouring Plague by 5.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Mindbender attacks.
Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to reset the cooldown of Shadow Word: Death, increase its damage by 25%, and deal damage as if striking a target below 20% health.
Your Shadowy Apparitions deal 15% increased damage and have a chance to generate 1 Insanity.
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 86,945 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 40% faster on all targets for 3 sec.

Summoning Mindbender causes you to gain a benefit based on your target's current state or increases its duration by 5 sec if no state matches.

Healthy: You and your Mindbender deal 5% additional damage.

Enraged: Devours the Enraged effect, increasing your Haste by 5%.

Stunned: Generates 5 Insanity every 1 sec.

Feared: You and your Mindbender deal 5% increased damage and do not break Fear effects.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 136,394 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.

Consuming Surge of Insanity has a 100% chance to conjure Shadowy Apparitions.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.

Peer into the mind of the enemy, attempting to steal a known spell. If stolen, the victim cannot cast that spell for 20 sec.

Can only be used on Humanoids with mana. If you're unable to find a spell to steal, the cooldown of Thoughtsteal is reset.

Assault an enemy's mind, dealing 431,097 Shadow damage and briefly reversing their perception of reality.

For 7 sec, the next 1.1 million damage they deal will heal their target, and the next 1.1 million healing they deal will damage their target.

Generates 10 Insanity.
Reduces the cooldown of Mass Dispel by 60 sec.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 298,295 over 15 sec.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 81,966 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Purify additionally removes all Disease effects.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.
Prayer of Mending does 45% increased healing to the initial target.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 4%.

Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal is reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 175,962 and dealing 295,787 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.
Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 1.7 million.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 10 yds for 491,336.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 10 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

Castable while stunned. Cannot save the target from massive damage.
Chastises the target for 561,683 Holy damage and incapacitates them for 4 sec.

After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your healing done during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 46 yards for 133,582.
Increases the duration of Spirit of Redemption by 50% and the range of its spells by 50%.

Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
When Prayer of Mending jumps to a target affected by your Renew, that target is instantly healed for 41,136.

Heals all party or raid members within 46 yards for 1.5 million over 4.3 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
You regenerate mana 10% faster.
Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 10%.
While channeling Divine Hymn, place 2 stacks of Prayer of Mending on up to 3 allies within its range every 0.9 sec.
Bolster the morale of raid members within 46 yds. They each recover 30 sec of cooldown of a major defensive ability, and regain 10% of their missing mana, over 3.4 sec.

Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.

Reset the cooldown of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.

Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify gain an additional charge.
Your Holy Words extend the duration of Apotheosis by 1.0 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Words by 15 sec.
Prayer of Mending has a 15% chance to not consume a charge when it jumps to a new target.

Increases the healing done by Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify by 40%.

Increases the radius of Holy Word: Sanctify by 30%.
Your Holy Words have a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of Prayer of Mending.

Creates a Holy Lightwell. Every 1 sec the Lightwell will attempt to heal a nearby party or raid member within 46 yards that is lower than 75% health for 263,105 and apply a Renew to them for 6 sec. Lightwell lasts for 2 min or until it heals 15 times.

Cooldown reduced by 3 sec when you cast Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify.

When you use a Holy Word spell, you summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 9 sec, whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.

If an image has already been summoned, that image is empowered instead.
After your Prayer of Mending heals 50 times, gain Apotheosis for 8 sec.
Your damage dealt is increased by 12% while Dark Ascension is active and by 20% while Voidform is active.
Enemies damaged by your Halo take 2% increased damage from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Insanity.
Psychic Scream creates an image of you at your location. After 4 sec, the image will let out a Psychic Scream.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.

Increases the damage done by Mind Flay: Insanity and Mind Spike: Insanity by 60%.

Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.
Halo damage and healing is increased by 30%.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Consuming Surge of Insanity has a 100% chance to conjure Shadowy Apparitions.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 298,295 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 84,172 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 59,203 Holy damage to enemies and up to 35,085 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 20% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 75%.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.
